ygData.subject: Re: Where do we go from here?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/21/99 8:54:52 PM Central Daylight Time, rscott@NetUSA.Net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/21/99 8:54:52 PM Central Daylight Time,
rscott@... writes:

<< A better answer to "Where do we go from here is?" we write a petition
or something to fix fireworks. ANd to make the fishing pole unbreakable
so it will have some real advantage over the normal fishing pole.
Reusable bait would be nice too. Then we ask for a 3rd or 4th book
describing infravision goggles , aqualungs and jet packs.

---ralph
>>
Here Here this should be done ASAP and mentioned every day the only way they
look at this stuff is if they get bombareded with complaints whoever has that
gnome guild should have all of them send /feedback on this issue.
